== Jackalope Cubism ==

Noticed there were not a lot of submissions for this release. Thought I would add some last minute ideas.

=== Concept ===
Combined a picture of a rabbit and a mule deer. Used Gimp Cubism filter to give it a unique feel. Ran Gaussian Blur on the Background to soften it.
